sofya.ed.semantic
Interface ObjectEventCriterion

Deprecated. This is a prototype solution that will likely be superceded by a better design at a future time. 

public interface ObjectEventCriterion

Defines a filtering criterion used to filter events from an object-correlated event stream using an ObjectEventFilter.

Version:
09/06/2006
Author:
Alex Kinneer

Method Summary
 boolean isMatch(byte eventCode, EventListener.ThreadData td, EventListener.ObjectData od, EventListener.FieldData fd)
          Deprecated. Checks whether an object-correlated field event satisfies this criterion.
 boolean isMatch(byte eventCode, EventListener.ThreadData td, EventListener.ObjectData od, EventListener.MethodData md)
          Deprecated. Checks whether an object-correlated method event satisfies this criterion.
 boolean isMatch(byte eventCode, EventListener.ThreadData td, EventListener.ObjectData od, EventListener.MonitorData md)
          Deprecated. Checks whether an object-correlated monitor (lock) event satisfies this criterion.
 

Method Detail

isMatch

boolean isMatch(byte eventCode,
                EventListener.ThreadData td,
                EventListener.ObjectData od,
                EventListener.MethodData md)
Deprecated. 
Checks whether an object-correlated method event satisfies this criterion.

Parameters:
eventCode - Constant indicating the type of method event on which the criterion is being evaluated.
td - Information about the thread in which the event occurred.
od - Information about the object on which the event occurred.
md - Information about the method in which the event occurred.
Returns:
true if the event is to be retained, false if the event is to be filtered (removed).

isMatch

boolean isMatch(byte eventCode,
                EventListener.ThreadData td,
                EventListener.ObjectData od,
                EventListener.FieldData fd)
Deprecated. 
Checks whether an object-correlated field event satisfies this criterion.

Parameters:
eventCode - Constant indicating the type of field event on which the criterion is being evaluated.
td - Information about the thread in which the event occurred.
od - Information about the object on which the event occurred.
fd - Information about the field on which the event occurred.
Returns:
true if the event is to be retained, false if the event is to be filtered (removed).

isMatch

boolean isMatch(byte eventCode,
                EventListener.ThreadData td,
                EventListener.ObjectData od,
                EventListener.MonitorData md)
Deprecated. 
Checks whether an object-correlated monitor (lock) event satisfies this criterion.

Parameters:
eventCode - Constant indicating the type of monitor event on which the criterion is being evaluated.
td - Information about the thread in which the event occurred.
od - Information about the object on which the event occurred.
md - Information about the monitor on which the event occurred.
Returns:
true if the event is to be retained, false if the event is to be filtered (removed).
